titles: Luke Huttons lamentation: which he wrote the day before his death, being condemned to be hanged at Yorke for his robberies and trespasses committed there-about. To the tune of Wandring and wavering..
author: Hutton, Luke, d. 1596.
notes: Contains three cuts, one of which appears to be only one half of a whole picture.

Right half of sheet contains "The second part, To the same tune."
